```{r Library, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(ranger)

```

```{r Prediction Data, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE}
si <- read_csv("CSVs/si.csv") %>% 
  select(-...1:-player_name, -prediction)

sl <- read_csv("CSVs/sl.csv") %>% 
  select(-...1:-player_name, -prediction)

cu <- read_csv("CSVs/cu.csv") %>% 
  select(-...1:-player_name, -prediction)
```

```{r 2023 Data, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE}
si_2023 <- read_csv("Updated Data/SI_interpitch_2020-2023.csv") %>% 
  filter(Season == 2023)

sl_2023 <- read_csv("Updated Data/SL_interpitch_2020-2023.csv") %>% 
  filter(Season == 2023)

cu_2023 <- read_csv("Updated Data/CU_interpitch_2020-2023.csv") %>% 
  filter(Season == 2023)
```

```{r Sinker Model}
si_model <- ranger(est_woba ~ ., data = si)
```

```{r Slider Model}
sl_model <- ranger(est_woba ~ ., data = sl)
```

```{r Curveball Model}
cu_model <- ranger(est_woba ~ ., data = cu)
```
